text: Kunjargad Fort/ Kombad Fort () is a fort located from Kalyan via Khireshwar. The fort is in Akole taluka in Ahmednagar district, of Maharashtra. The name of the fort is derived from the word “Kunj” meaning elephant in Sanskrit due to its similarity with an elephant. ==History== Not much history of the fort is known. Shivaji Maharaj halted on this fort in 1670. == See also == * List of forts in Maharashtra * List of forts in India * Marathi People * List of Maratha dynasties and states == References == Category:Buildings and structures of the Maratha Empire Category:Forts in Ahmednagar district
title: Kunjargad
